snippet: Paul McCartney became the last member of the Beatles to receive a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame, after his bandmates John Lennon, George Harrison and Ringo Starr and the band itself.
abstract: Paul McCartney became the last member of the Beatles to receive a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame, after his bandmates John Lennon, George Harrison and Ringo Starr and the band itself.
lead_paragraph: Paul McCartney may have nearly every music-industry honor under the sun, a new marriage and a funnily titled album to promote. But until Thursday he had never been given a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.

headline.main: When He's 69, McCartney Gets a Star on Hollywood Walk of Fame
